item.title: Using NGINX As A Load Balancer
item.description: Load balancing is a process of distributing a set of tasks to multiple resources (e.g. processing units or servers) with a goal of increasing efficiency of processing, maximizing throughput, reducing latency, and ensuring fault tolerant configuration. In this post we will take a look at how to configure load balancing with NGINX server.
